snippet: Morocco and Saudi Arabia responded with a heavy hand this week to messages posted by citizens on Facebook and Twitter that the kings deemed insulting to their values.
abstract: Morocco and Saudi Arabia responded with a heavy hand this week to messages posted by citizens on Facebook and Twitter that the kings deemed insulting to their values.
lead_paragraph: Morocco and Saudi Arabia, two kingdoms that have survived the Arab Spring's revolutionary wave, remain prickly when it comes to unwelcome speech on social media.

headline.main: In Morocco and Saudi Arabia, Limits Seen to Speech on Social Media
